Subskills.name: High Demon
Subskills.description: Lowers the mana cost of bone fragments.

Subskills.name: Sharp Bonerangs
Subskills.description: Bone fragments now bounce additional times on hit.

Subskills.name: Bone Frenzy
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to increase the amount of fragments.

Subskills.name: Bone Cannonade
Subskills.description: Chance of cast to unleash additional bone fragments.

Subskills.name: Demon's Fury
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of fragments.

Subskills.name: Blood Dipped Fragments
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Exoskeletal
Subskills.description: Chance to impale targets on hit sending them airborne dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Smart Bone
Subskills.description: Fragments seek the nearest monster dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Bloodshed
Subskills.description: Unleash nova of blood on hit if the target is bleeding.

Subskills.name: Witchcraft Essentials
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by bone fragments.

Subskills.name: Carved Fragments
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Demon's Grip
Subskills.description: Bone fragments orbit targets on hit for a short period of time dealing additional damage to nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Bone Altar
Subskills.description: Summon a bone altar at target location casting bone fragments for a short period. Bone fragments now has a cooldown.
